actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a wife, who is caring for her disabled husband, to receive wife's insurance benefits thereunder without regard to her age, if her husband is entitled to old-age or disability or disability benefits thereunder and requires the services of a full-time aide or attendant.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, a wife, who is caring for her disabled husband to receive wife's insurance benefits without regard to her age, if her husband is entitled to old-age or disability benefits and requires the services of a full-time aid or attendant.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to permit a wife, who is caring for her disabled husband, to receive wife's insurance benefits thereunder without regard to her age, if her husband is entitled to old-age or disability or disability benefits thereunder and requires the services of a full-time aide or attendant.
